sentences.sentence: This makes more bilirubin, which the liver needs to get rid of.
sentences.translation: 这使得更多的胆红素，肝脏需要摆脱。

sentences.sentence: Objective to study the serum level of bilirubin in patients with active and non-active systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE).
sentences.translation: 目的了解活动期和非活动期系统性红斑狼疮(SLE)患者血清胆红素水平。
